name: Director
tagline: Lovable for web automations
description: Director AI gets stuff done for you on the web using its own browser. With just a prompt, you can build and deploy workflows that automate any online task.

name: maestro SFX by beatoven.ai
tagline: Your own AI foley artist to create the perfect sound effect
description: maestro SFX is your personal, on-demand foley artist that turns simple text prompts into production ready sound effects. Just describe the precise sound you need and get high-fidelity, ready-to-use audio for your audio- visual project, instantly.

name: Claude Code on the web
tagline: A new way to delegate coding tasks right from your browser
description: With Claude Code on the web, assign multiple tasks that run in parallel while you monitor and steer from your browser or iOS app. Ideal for tackling bug backlogs, routine fixes, and parallel development work.

name: DeepSeek-OCR
tagline: Read documents like an image
description: DeepSeek-OCR is a model that compresses long text by treating it as an image. This optical compression uses far fewer vision tokens to represent documents, unlocking new levels of efficiency for long-context tasks while delivering powerful OCR capabilities.

name: Supervibes
tagline: Vibecode native iOS apps in Swift optimized for making money
description: Supervibes is the best vibecoding tool for iOS apps — the first made for Swift. Its lets you build, run, and ship real apps with or without Xcode. Start from scratch or import your existing project. Optimized for making money with the Superwall Docs MCP

name: Your360 AI
tagline: Coach-quality peer feedback for everyone through voice AI
description: Your360 AI makes executive coaching-quality feedback accessible to everyone. It turns confidential peer interviews into a personalized growth plan—delivering actionable insights at a fraction of the cost of traditional 360s. Voice-powered and private.

name: Trade with AI
tagline: AI that understands, builds, and trades automated strategies
description: Trade with AI is your entryway to Composer’s automated trading engine and 3,000+ community-built strategies. Start with single-click choices or plain-English prompts. Composer learns your interests, surfaces top performers, or helps you build a strategy fast.

name: Persuasive Patterns Card Deck (4th gen)
tagline: Make product psychology practical
description: 120 proven tactics driven by psychology, presented in a bite-size format for quick reference and brainstorming. Includes step-by-step guides to apply with your team. Use psychology to increase motivation and grow your business.

name: EraseVideo
tagline: A Free Mac app removes sora video watermarks in 1 minute
description: Remove AI video watermarks from Sora, Veo3, Keling instantly with our Mac app. No login, No internet, No upload. Fast, private, professional results in minutes.

name: Amp Free
tagline: Agentic coding tool built by Sourcegraph, free for everyone
description: Amp is a coding agent maximizing what's possible with today's latest AI models: autonomous reasoning, comprehensive code editing, and complex task execution. Available for free in VS Code, Cursor, Windsurf, and as a CLI.

name: Bloom
tagline: Refined Finder experience, reimagined for productivity
description: A powerful Finder replacement for Mac. Multi-pane layouts, lightning-fast search, advanced rename with regex, cloud support (iCloud, Dropbox, OneDrive), customizable shortcuts, and beautiful design. 7-day free trial, one-time payment.

name: Sparks AI
tagline: A platform for your agents, teammates & everything you build
description: Sparks AI is a platform where you can create custom AI agents with any model (GPT-5, Claude, Gemini). Add tools from our app store, get persistent memory, team collaboration, and agent teams that spawn helpers for complex tasks. No code required.

name: Sonura Studio
tagline: Lovable for sound - AI digital audio workstation
description: Sonura is the all-in-one AI music studio for producers, artists, and sound designers. Create loops, melodies, vocals, FX, one-shots, and full tracks in seconds.

name: Leadchee
tagline: The agentic CRM that maintains itself
description: Leadchee is a CRM for start-ups who actually need to close deals. Connect your Gmail, manage your pipelines, call clients internationally, send proposals — all in one place. AI handles the busy work so you can focus on selling. $29/month, everything included.

name: RightNow CLI
tagline: Claude Code for CUDA, an open-source AI CLI for GPU devs
description: Claude Code for CUDA. Free AI assistant that actually understands GPU architecture, write, debug, and optimize GPU kernels right from your terminal. Built by RightNow AI, the first GPU-native AI code editor.

name: Grapes Studio
tagline: AI-powered, HTML-first, drag & drop website & email builder
description: Grapes Studio is an AI-powered, HTML-first website & email builder built on GrapesJS. Generate sites with AI, edit visually or in code, and publish instantly. No React bloat, just clean, static HTML and full control over your projects.

name: Dappit
tagline: Your blockchain engineer that builds and deploys DAPPs
description: Dappit is your personal blockchain engineer — an AI agent that builds, writes, and deploys smart contracts for you. With Dappit, you can turn any idea into a live, on-chain application in just minutes Whether it’s a game, an app, or a fully fledged dApp.

name: Ekinox
tagline: Visual AI workflow builder with 80+ integrations
description: Build intelligent AI agents visually with Ekinox. Create powerful workflows without coding using our intuitive drag-and-drop platform. Connect 100+ integrations, automate complex processes, and scale your business intelligence effortlessly.

name: Swell Storefronts V2
tagline: Run Shopify themes on Swell, with visual editing and more
description: Launch an online store in minutes using Shopify themes and custom storefront apps. Customize everything visually, with powerful features like subscriptions and B2B wholesale. Now you can build your true ecommerce vision without compromise and hidden costs.

name: Briefing AI
tagline: Walk in. Win the room. Never wing another meeting
description: Paste your calendar invite. Get instant dossiers on attendees, company insights, and talking points in 30 seconds. Built for professionals who refuse to wing important meetings. Your secret weapon for VC pitches, sales calls, and career-defining moments.
